name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior GTM Engineer with 8 years of experience in leveraging technology for process improvement and data-driven decision-making. Proficient in **APIs**, **Python**, **JavaScript**, and **SQL**, enabling seamless integration with platforms such as **Salesforce**, **HubSpot**, and **Clay**. Adept at utilizing data analytics tools to drive strategic initiatives that enhance sales and marketing efficiency.
Specializing in high-performance solution development, I bring a solid foundation in full-stack technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**, and have successfully led the deployment of enterprise-grade applications. My hands-on background in modern frameworks empowers me to solve complex problems while aligning with industry standards. Additionally, I have contributed to enterprise platforms through intelligent automation and predictive analytics, ensuring compliance with regulations like HIPAA and PCI DSS. A proactive problem-solver, I am committed to leveraging advanced tech stacks to enhance programmatic GTM strategies.
